abstract: The billionaire investor Carl C. Icahn and Lions Gate Entertainment skirmished once again before a special shareholders meeting that may or may not be moot.
snippet: The billionaire investor Carl C. Icahn and Lions Gate Entertainment skirmished once again before a special shareholders meeting that may or may not be moot.
lead_paragraph: The billionaire investor Carl C. Icahn and Lions Gate Entertainment skirmished once again on Monday before a special shareholders meeting that may or may not be moot.

headline.main: Icahn and Lions Gate Duel Over Shareholders
